reviews.review: This movie is kinda creative with the animation style, but it kinda fall into super duper quarduple stupid cliches.

I give 4 stars because, I actually kind of enjoyed the movie. I did not LOVE it but I still think it was good. The Emoji Movie was not horrible animated, I actually enjoyed the animation. Voice acting was all right and I liked 1 or 2 of the jokes. Overall it's a "meh" movie. (Get it?)

I saw this with one of my friends thinking I was gonna get a good laugh just to see how bad it is. DO NOT SEE THIS MOVIE IN THEATERS LIKE I DID PLEASE! ITS NOT EVEN SO BAD ITS GOOD! NO ITS SO BAD ITS BAAAAADD! DONT GIVE SONY YOUR HARD EARNED MONEY!!! DONT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE LIKE I DID!!!!!!
idiotic movie and absolutely unfunny humour wih an unrealistic ending

This movie looks like shit. Who would come up with a movie like this! Kids don't use emojis because they don't have a smartphone. And adults don't use emojis. This movie deserves a 1% rating on rotten tomatoes.
The jokes in this movie are not funny at all. Almost the same plot as wreck it Ralph and it did not make me express myself.

Though it may be harmless, everything about this film is ?? from the boring writing to the cliche characters and the animation, though quite creative, is generic. This film sucks and don't see it if you want to stay alive. I cannot believe Sony cancelled the Popeye movie for this ??.
This film made me think of misery and heart failure

Everyone: "Don't make a movie about emojis, that's stupid"

Sony: dOn'T mAkE a MoViE aBoUt EmOjIs, ThAt'S sTuPiD

I rate 5/7 perfect score

The emoji movie makes me sick. First of all there are 5 poop jokes in the fist ten minutes, it rips off 2 movies wreck it ralph and inside out and the jokes in the stupid movie don't make any sense AT ALL.For example: gene asks a clock emoji what time it is and the clock emoji replies hey my
eyes are up here.No one should go watch this stupid movie its not one of those movies that are so bad its good.I do not recommend it at all.
